meanings.definition: To shine with a flickering light
meanings.sent1: The stars twinklier in the night sky.
meanings.sent2: The fireflies twinklier as the sun set.
meanings.sent3: The disco ball twinklier as the music played.
meanings.sent4: Her eyes twinklier with excitement as she opened the gift.
meanings.sent5: The candles on the cake twinklier brightly, making her smile.

meanings.definition: More twinkling or sparkling than something else
meanings.sent1: The sequined dress was twinklier than the plain one.
meanings.sent2: The diamond ring looked twinklier under the spotlight.
meanings.sent3: The glitter on the card made it look twinklier than the others.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was twinklier than the stars in the sky.
meanings.sent5: The dew on the grass made it look even twinklier in the morning light.
